document_data.name: Fellowship of Bowyers and Fletchers
document_data.base: [[Citadel of the Arrow]], [[Trades Ward of Waterdeep|Trades Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]]
document_data.orgname: the Fellowship of Bowyers and Fletchers
document_data.mainbody: The '''Fellowship of Bowyers and Fletchers''' was a [[Guilds of Waterdeep|guild]] in the city [[Waterdeep]] made up of the city's [[bow]]-and-[[arrow]] crafters, still young by [[1357 DR]]. Despite the high demand for their wares, they maintained a carefree outlook and were not overly concerned with intense mercantile competition.
document_data.Activities:
The fellowship maintained a strict inspection protocol that ensured the goods produced by its members were all of the highest quality. All of their arrow shafts were made straight, fletches were secure allowing for sure flight, and arrow-heads were symmetrical and sharp.

They kept an exclusive contract with the city to produce the shafts that were used with the city's siege [[ballista]]e.
document_data.Uniform: Guild livery consisted of white jackets and cloaks that were decorated with diagonal red stripes.
document_data.Membership: The fellowship regularly accepted new members for an entrance fee of 5 [[gp]]. Their regular dues were a monthly fee of 8 [[sp]].
document_data.Notable Members:
* [[Halassiter Ahrian]]: A skilled bowman who ran the [[Master of the Bow]]
* [[Zorondar Riautar|Zorondar "the Nimble"]]: An expert on the [[crossbow]] and proprietor of [[Riautar's Weaponry]]
